pansal waththe thibu thambaili gas thuna hatharath kos gasath ee ayurin balana kala ane pidu situthuma waniya..)was kalaya yanu kumakdayi aththenma ee wana witath ma etharam dana siti yamak nowe..katina perahare pitupasata wi podi aathal ekak ganimin ehi gaman kara thibuna hara ee pilibandawa maha danumak ma sathu nowini.pansale was kalaya bawa ma ahamkhen dana gaththe ek irida sawaswaruwaka upasaka ammala hathara pas denek pamina hiti hatiye bo maluwa athugannata patan gath wita ee pilibandawa wimasima nisaya..kese ho edina sawasa haya pamana wana wita ek upasikawak pamina kala aaradhanawak anuwa narada himiyan gosin paya bhagayaka pamana bodhi pujawak thaba pamini athara..eyin pasu ma wisin kala wimasimata anuwa himiwarun thidenama was kalayath ehi ithihasayath..warthamanaye ema kalaya ha eeha sabandi wathawath ha charithra widith..mehi ema katayuthu kerena aakarayath ma hata pahada dena ladi.eyin pasuwada sathi deka thunakata warak mewan wu bodhi puja pawath wu athara..samahara dinawaladi upasaka ammala wisin rupiyal paha dahaya sammadan kara yam mudalak narada himiyan wetha dahath wattiyaka thaba puja karana ladi..boho wita ehi rupiyal panahak hatak wini..pansalata me wana wita lakhena aadayam pilibandawada yam satahanak kala yuthuweyi.paramparika washayen wadagath kamak athi mema pansala malwathu parshawayen aarambha wu pahatharata sasana paramparawaka mulasthanaya wini.meyin wihida giya wu bhikshun wisin athi karanu labu wishala pansal rashiyak wiya..namudu ema kisidu pansalakin mema mulasthana wiharaya raka ganima sadaha kisidu sahayak nowini..yam uthsawa awasthawakadi pamanak pamina me ape mulasthana pansala yayi aadambarayen pawasa pitawi yanawa hara an yamak daknata nolabuni.danata mema wiharayehi nithyanukula ayithiya thibune wideshagathawa siti loku hamudurukenekutaya..ema himiyanta ayathwa mema pansalata yabada nagara madhyaye thanu nawa wiharayakda..kurunagala saha wadduwe pihiti wiharasthanayan dekakda..kolambaa itha prasiddha nagarayaka wu pansalakda, mema pansala pihiti pradeshiya lekam wasamema wu thawath pansalakda aadi washayen nirawulwa pansal hayaka himikarathwaya thibuni.eeta amatharawa mema wiharayata ayath dayaka simawaka kelawarehi bodhiyak ropanaya kota aluthin pansalak aarambha kirima sadaha uthsaha gath sthanayakda thibini.pansala sathu idam kihipayakma awata thibuni..eewaye mulu wapasariya aasanna washayen akkara hatha atak wuni.eyin boho idam me wana witath samahara gihiyan wisin allagena bhukthi windimin thibu athara..eewa pansal idam bawa kiyanawa asimatath owun akamathi wiya..ithiriwa thibu idam kisiwaka kisidu bawa bogayak ho aadayam lada haki margayak nowini.ek idamaka pamanak gadol poranuwak dama gath ayek siti athara eyinda mema pansalata kisiwak nolabini.ihatha sandahan kala loku hamuduruwan jewipi kalabala dawaswaladi jewipi tharjana nisama ratin pitawi gos thibu athara ema himiyan mema gam wasingeda apamana pilikulata bandun wi thibu athara kihipa denek pamanak ehimiyange paththata katha karanu asannata dakinnata labini.ehimiyo wides gathawa wasara daha thunak pamana gewi gos thibu athara ese wides gatha wana wita mahana karanu labu gola himiwarun hath ata denekuma mema wiharasthanayehi menma nagaraye wu wiharayehida randawa gos thibu athara me wana wita eyin gola himiwaru dedenaku hara an siyallanma siwuru hara gos thibuni.eyin ithiriwa siti himiwarungen wadimahalla aasanna nagaraye wiharasthanayehi wisu athara...an thanaththa kolambaa pihiti wiharasthanayehi randi sitiyeya..ema kolao siti himiyan widesgathawa siti loku hamuduruwan samaga athi hithawath wu athara aasannayehi wu himiyan wirasakawa sitina ladi..me hethuwa nisama kolambaa radi siti himiyanta wadimahalu kama paseka thibiyadi wadi balayak himiwa thibuni.esema aasanna pansale siti himiyan me wana wita katayuthu kale siwuru harada yamata man soyamini..ee sandaha gath uthsahayedi wanchanika pudgalayaku haraha widesgatha wimata kala uthsahayakadi ee himiyan atha thibu wishala mudalak ahimiwa gos thibu nisa ema gihi wime katayuththa tharamak kalgatha wi thibini.laga patha wu ida kadamwalin sulu washayen ho lakhena aadayama pawa ema himiwarun athara khedi giya athara kolambaa pansalen paudgalika panthi haraha lakhena wishala mudalak ehi radi hun himiyanta himi wini.eyin kisima kotasak nolabima nisa aasanna pansale randi hiti himiyan sitaye ithamath kenthiyakin bawa ee himiyan warin wara karanu labana katha walin pahadiliwa daknata labuni.kese ho me wana wita pansale randi siti narada himiyan wachanaye parisamaptha arthayenma bodinkarayaku pamanak wini.danaya nathi wita kadagena bima nisama thambaili wikuna kiyak ho labima dushkaraya..pansal waththatama thibune pol gas hayaki.eyinudu dekakma maha parata barawi thibu heyin eewaye gediyak wikunanu thaba ahata dakinnatawath kawadawath nohaki wini.thawath gas dekak ahasa usata gaman kota kanatu wi thibu athara inda hita eyin watena kuda pol gediya aahara pinisa ganima sandaha gannawa ara an yamak kala nohaki wiya.ithiri pol gas dekin ida hita pol wikuna rupiyal siyak desiyak lada haka..eeta amatharawa danaya gena ena udawiya wisin inda hita widuli bilata kiya di yana rupiyal dahaya wissa ekathu karanne nam eyada masayakata rupiyal ekasiya panahak pamana wiya haka..budu madure wu pin pettiye agulak nomatha.ida hita ho eyata watena maru kasi kihipaya gannata pramada wuwa hoth issaraha waththe sitina kollangen khera ganimata kisiwakuta hakiwanne natha..me aadi washayen balana kala rupiyal pansiyak tharama aadayamak masikawa lada nohaki mehi wiharadhipathi kama yanu katu otunnak wina anyamak nowana bawa kiwa manada..?...................................."oba kiyana de pilibandawa thawath warak sithanne nam manawi.ayi mewa ahala kalakirenne..yatharthaya therum ganta ganta minissu kalakirenne naha..yam sanhindiyawakata path wenawa misa..me kathawa mama kawada hari kiyala iwara wena dawasata mata uwamana minisun amuthuwen me dewal gana kalpana karala hama deyak pilibandawawath upekshawen balanawa dakinnata wina..kisiwakutath pansal pilibandawa ho gihi samajaya pilibandawa ho kalakirawima nowe..
